frame.name: Top Casts
frame.subtitle: Daily ranking of the most engaged Farcaster casts
frame.description: See the best Farcaster casts at a glance. We track replies, likes and recasts, aggregate the last 24 hours and rank posts by engagement. Clean, fast, mini app
frame.tagline: Top Farcaster posts in one app
frame.ogDescription: Best Farcaster casts of the last 24 hours by replies, likes and recasts
